notFoundDescription: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.
serverErrorDescription: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.
networkErrorDescription: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your internet connection.
authErrorDescription: You need to sign in to access this page.
permissionErrorDescription: You don't have permission to access this resource.
validationErrorDescription: Please check the form data and try again.
timeoutErrorDescription: The request took too long to complete. Please try again.
rateLimitErrorDescription: You've made too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
maintenanceModeDescription: The site is currently under maintenance. Please check back later.
offlineModeDescription: You're currently offline. Some features may not be available.
fileUploadErrorDescription: Failed to upload file. Please check the file size and format.
locationErrorDescription: Unable to access your location. Please enable location services.
genericErrorDescription: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
